text: Nickolas Gene Carter (born January 28, 1980) is an American actor, musician, and pop singer. He is a member of the music group the Backstreet Boys. In 2002, he released his first solo album called Now or Never, the album reached #17 on the Billboard 200 chart and was certified gold. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from New York (state) Category:People from Jamestown, New York Category:Backstreet Boys members
title: Nick Carter
